pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā bhātuno saddhivihārikassa bhikkhuno ārocesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.6_0: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.7_0: So parivasanto taṁ bhikkhuṁ passitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.8_1: sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā saṅghaṁ tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ yāciṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.8_2: tassa me saṅgho tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ adāsi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.9_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, yo aññopi imaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati sopi evaṁ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.11_1: āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sañcetanikaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā so me āroceti mā kassaci ārocehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.14_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.15_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.16_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṁ duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ paṭicchādessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.17_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhikkhussa jānaṁ duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ paṭicchādesī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.20_0: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhussa jānaṁ duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ paṭicchādessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.22_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:1.23.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṁ duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ paṭicchādeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.1.8_0: sāmaṁ vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.1.10_0: cattāri ca pārājikāni terasa ca saṅghādisesā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.1_0: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā duṭṭhullāpattisaññī paṭicchādeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.2_0: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā vematiko paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.3_0: Duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā aduṭṭhullāpattisaññī paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.2.5_0: Anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṁ vā aduṭṭhullaṁ vā ajjhācāraṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.3.2_0: “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṁ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti nāroceti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc64:2.3.4_0: “ayaṁ kakkhaḷo pharuso jīvitantarāyaṁ vā brahmacariyantarāyaṁ vā karissatī”ti nāroceti,
